hero.title: Jordan Garcia
hero.subtitle: Web Developer
hero.description: I’m drawn to web development because it reveals how systems shape our everyday experience. For me, programming is more than code—it’s a tool to simplify life, improve connection, and explore the deeper logic of how things work.

skill_descriptions.graphic_design: Creating visual content that communicates messages effectively
skill_descriptions.interface_design: Building intuitive interfaces for digital products
skill_descriptions.user_experience: Designing seamless and enjoyable user journeys

process.title: Process
process.description: My methodical approach ensures every project meets and exceeds expectations

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Designing with passion for Problem Solving
about.description: As a product designer, I focus on creating intuitive and impactful digital experiences. My approach combines aesthetic sensibility with user-centered functionality.
